title: Post-Pandemic Online Learning Experiences and Constructivist-Based Practical Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Usage of Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: A mobile-optimized learning environment for strengthening social studies competencies among current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three online learning design strategies that reflect constructivist principles.
Learners can create and implement self-directed learning plans in mobile environments.
Learners can demonstrate the process of redefining their learning identity through peer feedback and reflective journaling.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
